about_me: I'm a software developer living in Brasília, Brazil. I am currently pursuing a degree in :Software Engineering: at the University of Brasília and studying a little bit of :Graphic Design: on the side. I like solving problems and building useful things.
interest_text: I'm fascinated by :UI/UX:, interested in :DevOps:, and in ❤️ with :FOSS:.
interest_text2: I'm also a :Cryptocurrency: enthusiast and a :Game Dev: newbie.
skills_text: As a Fullstack Developer, I can work well on any part of a software project. Also, I wouldn't be uncomfortable taking part in the DevOps or UI/UX design process.
contact_text: I am currently available for :Freelance Work:. If you think that I can help with something, or if you just feel like saying hi, feel free to leave me a :Message:.
name: Name
message_sent_text: Thanks! I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
payment_text: Aside from traditional :Payment Methods:, I also accept various :Cryptocurrencies:.
coffee: Also, if you're feeling generous, you can buy me a ☕ using these nice :QR Codes:.
